message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  Hope you'll agree!
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be reasonable - I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Take it or leave it, the clock is ticking!
Okay, I'll counter your offer. I'm willing to give you 30%, but I need at least 70%. This is my final offer, if you reject it, you'll get nothing in the next round due to inflation!
